entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy except sunny north of Marystown this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries.
